content: on tangles there are some good tutorials and videos online but the gist is that you hold one colour in each hand and knit english-style with the right- hand colour and continental-style with the left-hand colour i m an english-style knitter key so i practised knitting continental-style on a plain vanilla hat before i tackled two-handed stranding to avoid too-tight floats stretch out the stitches on the right-hand needle when changing colours in rounds with only one colour carry the other yarn up on the wrong side until it s needed again twisting it with the working yarn 3 chart 2 key work once each chart row represents one 16-stitch pattern repeat charts are read right-to-left on all row abbreviations s2kp slip the next 2 stitches together knitwise knit 1 stitch then pass both slipped cc contrasting or foreground colour stitches over the knit stitch 2 stitches decreased centred k knit ssk slip the next 2 stitches one-by-one k2tog knit the next 2 stitches together knitwise insert left-hand needle through 1 stitch decreased right-leaning the slipped stitches and knit them mc main or background colour together through the back loops 1 stitch decreased left-leaning p purl © amy van de laar 2012 v 5 september 2020 www baroquepurls com
